'''Experimental Drink No. 6''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtainable from the {{Quest|Time to Drink}}.

==How to Obtain==
Experimental Drink No. 6 can be obtained from ''Time to Drink'' by choosing the following dialogue options in the respective encounters in the {{Quest|Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!}}:
* First Encounter: "Uh, let's leave the sweet flavor be, shall we?"
* Second Encounter: "I reckon carbonation's for the best."
* Third Encounter: "I'd like to try some carbonated tea, sure."
Subsequent encounters of ''Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!'' past the third do not affect which [[Experimental Drink]] is obtained.
